divs: Sighting DetailsOk so i normally dont believe in UFO's etc but last night my brother went out to have a cigarette before bed, he comes in and states he has just seen something freaky. He stated that he briefly looked up at the sky and seen a massive bright yellow triangle that was there for a second then shot away where it fastly got smaller until it was gone, this all lasted a couple of seconds, i initially said it was a satellite until he went on further to say this was the size of a football pitch... he had no idea what it was but said its the first thing hes seen in the sky that he could not explain. Now most people i would not believe, but my nan and grandad always said they seen UFO's and now my brother is saying the same thing, he has no reason to lie and is a level headed normal person like myself. Any explanation for this?
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Bristol
There were no other sightings in Bristol on or around October 22nd 2009
